description:
The remarkable Emi and http://anidb.net/ch7040 [Yumi] Hanner are young girls who first meet http://anidb.net/ch7033 [Tylor] while they are taking care of their father, Admiral http://anidb.net/ch38780 [Robert J. Hanner] (retired). After they are taken hostage, Emi and Yumi are rescued by Tylor and fall in love with him. They join the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]`s crew when Tylor is reassigned as its captain.
Desired to pilot ships, they persuade http://anidb.net/ch7042 [Kojirou] to train them (against his will of course) and discover that they have a natural piloting ability. Emi and Yumi`s close quarters with Kojirou provide them with endless amusement since he is deathly afraid of females.
Identical twins, the only way to tell them apart is by their pony tails (Yumi`s is on the left side of her head, while Emi`s is on her right) and their voices (Yumi`s is higher pitched than Emi`s). They were also childhood friends of http://anidb.net/ch7033 [Yuriko Star].
name: Emi Hanner
